metadata.title: Woman Within Women's Plus Size Petite Sport Knit Side-Slit Skirt
features: PETITE PLUS SIZING: Size 26 / 28 will fit Plus sizes 26 to 28

This maxi skirt is made in a sporty knit jersey and has an elastic waistband with drawstring to accent the athleisure style. Side slits in the hem allow for easy movement, and side seam pockets are a favorite added detail. Perfect for pairing with anything from sneakers to flat to sandals, this relaxed style is the ultimate in comfort dressing.
Regular fit measures 36” length, Petite fit measures 34” length
Sits above the waist, 12” side slits, Regular: 36” length, Petite: 34” length

ABOUT THE BRAND: At Woman Within we’re the experts in plus size comfort, and we’ve been doing this for over 100 years. No surprise then that we’re one of the go-to brands in the plus-size clothing industry for incredible fit and of-the-moment style. Our goal is to make sure you always feel great and look good in our comfortable clothes in all the colors you love.
